sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const About = () => (

About Me

Hi, I'm Nama Srilatha, an enthusiastic and self-driven Software Development Engineer passionate about building impactful web applications. With a strong foundation in the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), I enjoy turning ideas into real-world solutions through code.

I’ve built projects ranging from a full-fledged AI-powered job recommendation platform to fun games like Tic-Tac-Toe and Stone-Paper-Scissors. I love solving problems, collaborating with other developers, and continuously improving my skills.

I'm also experienced in deploying applications using Vercel, making my React projects live, fast, and accessible with custom domains and automatic CI/CD workflows. I believe in not just building, but also delivering clean, production-ready apps.

Currently, I’m focused on sharpening my Data Structures & Algorithms knowledge to pursue opportunities at top tech companies. I believe in writing clean, scalable code and learning by doing.

Beyond coding, I enjoy exploring new tech, reading up on AI advancements, and occasionally contributing to open-source.

); export default About;
